downloadTitle: Microsoft® SQL Server® Additional Software License Terms and Information
downloadDescription: Microsoft SQL Server Additional Software License Terms and Information site provides the legal terms and conditions for using the Additional Software included alongside Microsoft SQL Server software.
detailsSection:
Microsoft SQL Server Additional Software License terms and Information provides the legal terms and conditions for the Additional Software included alongside Microsoft SQL Server software.

Microsoft SQL Server includes other Microsoft programs which are listed below. These programs are licensed under the terms and conditions associated with them. You may only use these programs in conjunction with the software licensed here. If you do not accept the license terms associated with a program, you may not use that program.

Note: Below you will find the following End User License Agreements and terms applicable for this release:
  • Other Microsoft Program Licenses - SQL Server software also contains other Microsoft Programs, each of which are licensed under the terms and conditions of their respective program’s license.
    • Microsoft Visual Studio Add-ons, Visual Studio Shells and C++ Redistrubutable
    • Microsoft .Net Framework
systemRequirementsSection:
Note: The End User License Agreements can be viewed using Microsoft Word or a standard text editior

>
installInstructionSection: Download the appropriate file by clicking the "Download" button located in the "File in this Download" section of this page. Then open the downloaded file to view.
